thread.title: Keke Palmer wears three different outfits to promote book | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Keke Palmer wears three different outfits to promote book | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Keke Palmer wears three different outfits to promote book | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Keke Palmer is really trying to show off her fashion credentials. The actress is currently doing the rounds to promote her new book, I Don't Belong to You: Quiet The Noise And Find Your Voice. And on Wednesday the 23-year-old was seen sporting three different outfits as she stopped by the Wendy Williams show and AOL Build Series in New York City. Scroll down for video Killing it: For the Wendy Williams Show in New York Keke Palmer wore a very bold metallic dress and a matching jacket For the Wendy Williams Show she wore a very bold metallic dress and a matching jacket. The mini dress showed off her lithe legs as she tied her red locks into a high ponytail. The Scream Queens actress accessorized with a pair of dainty nude heels as she posed up a storm outside the studio. Classic: For her next appearance the young star sported a black two piece for her appearance at AOL Build Series All angles: The red head showed off her classy outfit from every angle For her next appearance the young star sported two different outfits for her appearance at AOL Build Series. Arriving she wore a black side split skirt and a lace mesh high neck top with a nude strap top underneath. She decided to accessorize with a pair of elaborate black heels as she kept her hair the same. Elegant: Arriving she wore a black side split skirt and a lace mesh high neck top with a nude strap top underneath Same do: She decided to accessorize with a pair of elaborate black heels as she kept her hair the same Leaving the event Keke continued to pose for the cameras but instead opted to wear matching sweats. She wore a pair of eye catching flared grey bottoms with white lining down the side, as she added a matching hoodie over the top. I Don't Belong To You: Quiet The Noise And Find Your Voice, is her first book. Laid back chic: Leaving the event Keke continued to pose for the cameras but instead opted to wear matching sweats Her new book is a combination of memoir and self-help, and the brunette bombshell hopes she can help others through her own experiences. 'Being able to say how I feel, that was something that was so hard for me for so long,' she recently opened up to Cosmopolitan magazine, talking about her struggle with anxiety and depression. And while she's busy promoting her new book at the moment, the one-time Broadway star says she's planning on moving to Atlanta soon to take a much-needed 'break' away from the glare of Hollywood. Comfy casual: She wore a pair of eye catching flared grey bottoms with white lining down the side, as she added a matching hoodie over the top Share or comment on this article 58
